General.Name: Sunindo Adipersada Tbk Pt
General.Description: PT Sunindo Adipersada Tbk engages in children's toys business in Indonesia, Asia, Europe, North America, Canada, and Australia. The company operates through Original Equipment Manufacturer and OZco Brand segment. The company offers realistic, fancy, and baby toys; costumes, seasonal collections, hand puppets, and utilities; OZco Mini Bird Park, Mini Pets, Mini Zoo, Mini Ocean, and Mini Farm products; and licensed products. It is also involved in trading of playing equipment and children toys; and wholesale trading of textiles, clothing, and footwear. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia.
